timeline: 5 months after Chapter 11 (3 months to open Building 2, then 2 more months expanding)
location: Multiple buildings across Sectors 4, 6, 7, 8, 9; Jax's offices

knows: Has opened 7 buildings total (165 units, 640 residents)
Has spent close to 1 billion credits on the project
Operating costs are 32 million per month (384 million per year)
Waiting list is 1,500 people
30 people on staff across all operations
Word is spreading to Level 8 - some Gammas asking to move down for community
People are calling it 'the Free Level' as a place, not just buildings
Some residents want to petition for Level 9 independence
Mother Sera has noticed and semi-blessed the project
The Collector keeps buying currency - latest payment 400 million
He's thinking about job creation and commercial properties next
Has enough money to run current operations for 5 years if he stops expanding
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Driven, purposeful, committed to expansion, aware he's building something significant
Jax Varro.location: Rotating between offices in Buildings 47, Sector 6, and Sector 9
Jax Varro.physical_state: Working late, not sleeping enough, sustained by purpose
Jax Varro.wealth: Spent ~1 billion, continues receiving hundreds of millions from Collector
Jax Varro.transformation: No longer seeking escape - building a way forward instead

knows: Hired kitchen staff (5 people initially, now more)
Feeding 200+ people daily across buildings
Jax is looking at commercial properties for job creation
Talk on Level 8 about the Free Level
Jax has stopped trying to escape and started building forward
Jax works too much and doesn't sleep enough
Finn.emotional_state: Supportive, proud of what they're building, concerned about Jax's health
Finn.location: Building 47 primarily, rotating to other locations
Finn.role: Kitchen operations manager, hiring and coordinating food service

knows: Jax is buying condemned buildings and giving away housing
He tried to leave undercity and couldn't
He's spending massive amounts of money on Gammas
People are calling it the Free Level
This is giving people hope and expectations
Lives in Sector 9, Building 17
Mother Sera.action: Semi-blessed the project publicly, invited Jax to talk about what he's really building

knows: Managing waiting lists and logistics
1,500 people currently waiting
All operational numbers and statistics
Was doing off-books accounting before Jax hired her
Zara.emotional_state: Protective of residents, brilliant with numbers

revealed_to_reader: Building 2: Sector 6 Block 23, 30 units, cost 100 million
Building 3: Sector 9, 15 units, cost 110 million
Building 4: Sector 7 (opening scene), size not specified
Total through expansion: 7 buildings, 165 units, 640 residents
30 staff members hired
Dr. Okafor recruited as second doctor, clinics running 5 days a week
Kitchen staff: 5 people hired, preparing food for 200+ daily
Maintenance: Kara's crew hired permanently at triple wages
Security: Kovak (former private security) and Iris (former undercity police)
Administration: Zara (former off-books accountant)
Operating costs: 32 million per month, 384 million per year
Waiting list: 1,500 people
Total spent: close to 1 billion credits
Latest Collector payment: 400 million
Undercity forums discussing Free Level extensively
People on Level 8 talking about it, some Gammas wanting to move down
Residents want to petition for Level 9 independence recognition
200 people attended Building 4 opening
Someone made a 'Welcome to the Free Level' sign
Mother Sera publicly tested and semi-blessed the project
Jax thinking about commercial properties for job creation
Planning buildings in Sectors 5, 8, 11
Has 3 offices now across main buildings

planted.element: Mother Sera inviting Jax to Building 17 to talk

planted.significance: Shows scale of need and demand

planted.element: Talk on Level 8, Gammas wanting to move down
planted.significance: The influx chapter - people moving from legal levels to Free Level
Next phase of Free Level development

planted.element: Someone had to be noticing from levels above
Money running out in 5 years at current rate

planted.significance: Key staff member, protective of project

active_tensions: Building 1 billion credits worth of infrastructure
Word spreading to upper levels = attention from authority
Hope building versus potential for crushing disappointment
Whether this can last or will collapse
Question of what happens when money runs out
Mother Sera's test of Jax's motives pending
world_changes: Free Level now has 7 buildings, 165 units, 640 residents, 30 staff
Operating as unified organization across multiple sectors
Recognized community called 'the Free Level' by residents
Talk reaching Level 8, affecting Gamma workers in legal zones
Mother Sera has semi-publicly endorsed the project
Large public gatherings (200+ people) at building openings
Job creation beginning - 30 people employed with fair wages
Undercity economy shifting - fair wages, free services available
continuity_notes: Mother Sera lives in Sector 9, Building 17
Jax has offices in Buildings 47 (Sector 4), Sector 6 building, Sector 9 building
Latest Collector payment: 400 million (suggests ongoing sales)
Next chapter will be meeting with Mother Sera at Building 17
emotional_beats: Reading forum posts - validation that it's working
Mother Sera's public test at Building 4 opening
Her semi-blessing and invitation to talk
200 people showing up as if it matters
Finn noting Jax has stopped trying to escape
Jax's realization he's building a way forward
Awareness that someone above must be noticing
Commitment to keep building until something stops him
